about_the_game:
Rules are simple:
If you observe an anomaly, something out-of-place or something not-seen-before, run back to where you started.
Otherwise, keep running.
When you reach Exit 11, you’ll manage to escape from this nightmare.

Exit Slum 11 is a short "running" simulator inspired by Backrooms and Liminal Spaces.

However, we strongly advise that you walk around and observe carefully since in each walkthrough there can be some randomly generated anomaly.
And if you fail to spot and anomaly, your dreams of exiting this nightmare will reset back to zero.
That's why you have to observe carefully, if you miss an anomaly your progress will be lost and you will have to start from the beginning.

The game uses latest version of Unreal Engine 5, so expect some nice visuals.

The game also has some occasional jumpscares, although the purpose of this game is not to scare the player, rather provide some mystery and eerie experience.

The game is designed with realism in mind, so there will be head-bobbing when you are running around.

The options menu has the ability to save your own key-bindings if you prefer something different that W,A,S,D..

The gameplay time can vary between 10 minutes or even up to 60 minutes depending on your observations skills.

name: Exit Slum 11

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivale
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Exit Slum 11 is an anomaly observation running simulator with an eerie atmosphere.
